tool_description: Music Data for Spotify, Apple Music, Amazon, Deezer, YouTube, TikTok, Shazam, Beatport, Traxsource, SoundCloud, TIDAL, iTunes, 𝕏 (Twitter), Bandsintown, Songkick & more...
name: Songstats
title: Songstats

api_list.name: Search Track
api_list.description: Search for a track.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Default: 20
Max: 100

api_list.name: Search Artist
api_list.description: Search for an artist.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Default: 20
Max: 100

api_list.name: Get Track Current Stats
api_list.description: Returns summary and detailed information of a track filtered by source.

required_parameters.name: source
required_parameters.description:
Specifies the sources that data is being requested for *

*Can be a comma separated list of individual sources like `spotify,apple_music,deezer` or be set to `all`.

optional_parameters.name: with_links
optional_parameters.description: Includes an array of all of the source links associated to the track.

optional_parameters.name: with_videos
optional_parameters.description: Includes an array of all of the videos currently associated to the track.

optional_parameters.name: with_playlists
optional_parameters.description: Includes an array of all of the playlists associated to the track.

optional_parameters.name: isrc
optional_parameters.description:
The ISRC of the track being requested *

*Either `spotify_track_id`,  `songstats_track_id` or `isrc` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: songstats_track_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Songstats ID of the track being requested *

*Either `spotify_track_id`,  `songstats_track_id` or `isrc` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: with_charts
optional_parameters.description: Includes an array of all of the charts associated to the track.

optional_parameters.name: spotify_track_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Spotify ID of the track being requested *

*Either `spotify_track_id`,  `songstats_track_id` or `isrc` **are required** for this request.

api_list.name: Get Track Info
api_list.description: Returns metadata information of a track.

optional_parameters.name: songstats_track_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Songstats ID of the track being requested *

*Either `spotify_track_id`,  `songstats_track_id` or `isrc` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: isrc
optional_parameters.description:
The ISRC of the track being requested *

*Either `spotify_track_id`,  `songstats_track_id` or `isrc` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: spotify_track_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Spotify ID of the track being requested *

*Either `spotify_track_id`,  `songstats_track_id` or `isrc` **are required** for this request.

api_list.name: Get Track Activities
api_list.description: Returns the latest activities of a track filtered by source.

optional_parameters.name: albums
optional_parameters.description: Include Album Activities.

optional_parameters.name: source
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the sources that data is being requested for. Can be a comma separated list of individual sources or be set to 'all'.

optional_parameters.name: milestones
optional_parameters.description: Include Milestone Activities.

optional_parameters.name: editorial
optional_parameters.description: Only include Editorial Activities.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the offset of the limited results being returned.

optional_parameters.name: songstats_artist_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Songstats ID of the artist being requested *

*Either `spotify_artist_id` or `songstats_artist_id` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: tier
optional_parameters.description: Filter Activities by importance. Tier 4 is the lowest tier that returns all activities. Tier 1 is the highest tier that returns only the most significant activities.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the limit of results being returned.

optional_parameters.name: spotify_artist_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Spotify ID of the artist being requested *

*Either `spotify_artist_id` or `songstats_artist_id` **are required** for this request.

api_list.name: Get Track Historic Stats
api_list.description: Returns historic information of a track filtered by source.

required_parameters.name: source
required_parameters.description:
Specifies the sources that data is being requested for *

*Can be a comma separated list of individual sources like `spotify,apple_music,deezer` or be set to `all`.

optional_parameters.name: spotify_track_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Spotify ID of the track being requested *

*Either `spotify_track_id`,  `songstats_track_id` or `isrc` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: songstats_track_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Songstats ID of the track being requested *

*Either `spotify_track_id`,  `songstats_track_id` or `isrc` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: start_date
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the start_date of the historic data that is being requested.

optional_parameters.name: isrc
optional_parameters.description:
The ISRC of the track being requested *

*Either `spotify_track_id`,  `songstats_track_id` or `isrc` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: end_date
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the end_date of the historic data that is being requested.

optional_parameters.name: with_aggregates
optional_parameters.description: Includes data points aggregated by Songstats like playlists_current, playlists_reach_current, charts_current, etc.

api_list.name: Get Label Top Tracks
api_list.description: Returns the top tracks of a label sorted by rank type.

optional_parameters.name: songstats_label_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Songstats ID of the label being requested *

*Either `beatport_label_id` or `songstats_label_id` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the limit of results being returned.

optional_parameters.name: beatport_label_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Beatport ID of the label being requested *

*Either `beatport_label_id` or `songstats_label_id` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: rank_type
optional_parameters.description: The rank type to sort top tracks by (can be any available_rank_type for a given source).

api_list.name: Get Artist Top Tracks
api_list.description: Returns the top tracks of an artist sorted rank type.

optional_parameters.name: spotify_artist_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Spotify ID of the artist being requested *

*Either `spotify_artist_id` or `songstats_artist_id` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: songstats_artist_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Songstats ID of the artist being requested *

*Either `spotify_artist_id` or `songstats_artist_id` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: rank_type
optional_parameters.description: The rank type to sort top tracks by (can be any available_rank_type for a given source).

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the limit of results being returned.

api_list.name: Get Definitions
api_list.description: Returns definitions for all data points.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://songstats.p.rapidapi.com/definitions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "songstats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://songstats.p.rapidapi.com/definitions"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "songstats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Artist Audience Details
api_list.description: Returns detailed audience information of an artist for a specific country filtered by source.

required_parameters.name: source
required_parameters.description:
Specifies the sources that data is being requested for *

*Can be a comma separated list of individual sources like `spotify,apple_music,deezer` or be set to `all`.

optional_parameters.name: spotify_artist_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Spotify ID of the artist being requested *

*Either `spotify_artist_id` or `songstats_artist_id` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: songstats_artist_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Songstats ID of the artist being requested *

*Either `spotify_artist_id` or `songstats_artist_id` **are required** for this request.

api_list.name: Search Label
api_list.description: Search for a record label.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description:
Default: 20
Max: 100

api_list.name: Get Label Activities
api_list.description: Returns the latest activities of a label filtered by source.

optional_parameters.name: offset
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the offset of the limited results being returned.

optional_parameters.name: editorial
optional_parameters.description: Only include Editorial Activities.

optional_parameters.name: albums
optional_parameters.description: Include Album Activities.

optional_parameters.name: milestones
optional_parameters.description: Include Milestone Activities.

optional_parameters.name: recent
optional_parameters.description: Only include Activities for recent tracks (released in past 3 months).

optional_parameters.name: songstats_label_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Songstats ID of the label being requested *

*Either `beatport_label_id` or `songstats_label_id` **are required** for this request.

optional_parameters.name: tier
optional_parameters.description: Filter Activities by importance. Tier 4 is the lowest tier that returns all activities. Tier 1 is the highest tier that returns only the most significant activities.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the limit of results being returned.

optional_parameters.name: source
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the sources that data is being requested for. Can be a comma separated list of individual sources or be set to 'all'.

optional_parameters.name: beatport_label_id
optional_parameters.description:
The Beatport ID of the label being requested *

*Either `beatport_label_id` or `songstats_label_id` **are required** for this request.

api_list.name: Get Sources
api_list.description: Returns currently supported data sources.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://songstats.p.rapidapi.com/sources"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "songstats.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
